decision_conditions: The specification is not suitable and therefore needs to be confirmed. The specification needs to be measurable and quantifiable so that we can understand the amount that is to be removed in meters. We need to know the amount to be removed and the remaining crown size. E.g. 2m crown reduction in width and 2m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 3m and height of 5m.
description:
T0079 Honey Locust - Crown Reduce by 2-3m. Current height 10m and current spread 6m, therefore leaving a height of 7-8m and spread 3-4m.
T0082 Ginkgo Biloba - Crown lift to 2.5m and clear lamp column. No change to overall height or spread. 
T9982 London Plane - Lateral spread by approx 1-2m & clear lamp column by 1m. No change to overall height or spread.
T4060 London Place - Crown Lift to 2m for pedestrian clearance. No change to overall height or spread.
